name: Aether Diving
summary:
"The Aether Diving program aims to perceive energy levels in the body and help get rid of imperfections. These imperfections get in the way of a healthy lifestyle. Pairing the latest in technology and relentless study of the Divine Scriptures, we have kept our followers’ faults and defects at bay. Join us now, diving deep into consciousness and freeing the mind from torment. Enlightment awaits."
-High Priest Maxime
